description: The humble iceberg lettuce gets an impressive makeover - sprinkled with crispy, spicy chorizo and drizzled with a sour cream and lime dressing, this tasty side is ready in just 10 minutes.
name: Iceberg Wedges With Crispy Chorizo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 iceberg lettuce, cut into large wedges, inner leaves removed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in small frying pan over medium heat. Cook chorizo for 5 minutes or until charred and crispy. Set aside.
Combine sour cream and lime juice in a small bowl, then season.
Arrange lettuce on a platter, spoon over chorizo and dressing, season with pepper and serve scattered with jalapeno.
